We are announcing the Public Preview of the Alerts feature in Power Platform Monitor, available in the Power Platform admin center. This feature will be available in all public clouds starting on August 18, 2025.

How does this affect me?
Alerts enable both tenant and environment administrators to define threshold-based rules on operational health metrics and receive proactive notifications when conditions are met. This capability complements the existing Monitor experience by helping you take timely action when apps or automations fall below expected performance standards.

Alerts support the following resource types:
  • Canvas apps
  • Model-driven apps
  • Cloud flows
  • Desktop flows
Notifications can be delivered via email, ensuring you stay informed without constantly checking dashboards.

What action do I need to take?
This message is for awareness and no action is required. No configuration or set up is needed to use the feature.

If you would like more information on this feature, please visit Create alerts for your resources (preview).
